markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Half-Elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=85)</title>

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 632 <sup>4.0</sup>

A creature with this trait is part [human](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=6) and part [elf](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=2). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by half-elves.
name: Half-Elf
